headline: What to Expect From Northrop Grumman's Q3 2025 Earnings Report
summary: Northrop Grumman’s third-quarter results are expected to be reported later this month, with analysts projecting a single-digit earnings decline.

headline: Northrop Grumman (NOC): Evaluating Valuation Following Major Defense Contracts and Sector Momentum
summary: Northrop Grumman (NOC) recently landed a pair of substantial contracts, including one for advanced radar systems and another for counter-explosive technology. The push from the Pentagon to accelerate missile production adds fuel to the company’s forward momentum. See our latest analysis for Northrop Grumman. As momentum in the defense sector climbs, Northrop Grumman’s latest contract wins have helped fuel a subtle but steady climb in its stock. The most recent moves, including the push to...

headline: Jim Cramer on Northrop Grumman: “I Want to Own the Stock”
summary: Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer was recently focused on. Inquiring about the stock, a caller asked if it is a good time to sell or to “let it ride”. Cramer replied: “No, no, no, no. It’s a high-quality company. Very good company. Good balance sheet, smart people. I want […]
